main.title: a police station
main.body: a small walled-in compound stands out against the dead world. the gate is hanging open, with lit lights inside. there's a single door leading to an unknown room, and another leading to what looks like was an office.

other.title: the other room
other.body:
a single holding cell is open to visitors, but there's no one inside. a few words have been scratched into the wall, covered in dust and barely legible.stuck in here at the end of the world. and for what? what does it matter anymore? now we are all on death row.
whoever wrote it must have lived to die somewhere else.

office.title: the office
office.body: a single desk is still organized, with papers arranged in neat piles. the computer has been left on, and there's a single email open. it reads:i thought we were the good guys, but they might be right about us. i just don't know what to believe anymore.

searching.title: the office
searching.body: maybe something useful is still here.
